examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello - I am an active customer and have been working with an account rep, but he has gone radio silent. Can you please figure out what is going on and have someone contact me.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I recently used Canva to do my sons yearbook ad. I made several templates and now when I go into to look at them they are all gone!! Can you please contact me ASAP!!! Very important 

Christy Marsh
<NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Let's start with it's very difficult to get issues resolved when you can talk to someone.  My account was charged on 1/14/2010 in the amount of $119.40.  Today it is trying to say I don't have pro and wants to charge me again.   ALL my work is gone!  I had folders and designs I have created over the months and they are gone.  It shows I have 3 teams, I checked under that an nothing.  I can't find my branding information.  PLEASE fix.  Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: ALL MY DESIGNS ARE GONE! My business is at a stand still. What happened? I've been using canva for YEARS. Please help

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Before I had a note-taking option and the option is gone. What happened to the notes that were there? We used this field for team communication.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: There isn’t any sound? There used to be and now it’s gone?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: so I did one for my friend and sent it to her I went to open it to see if it was good and it was gone and by that time I removed it

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Signed in today and Cava treats me like a new acct.  I am a Pro Memeber and All my stuff is gone?  Help

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue:  I NEED MY WORK BACK AND IT NOT IN MY TRASH AND I DIDN’T DO ANYTHING WITH IT I JUST DELETE MY TEAM AND MY WORK ALL GONE MY PROFILE GONE!!
What do you need help with?: Hello - I am an existing customer my account rep has gone radio silent and we are trying to remedy a payment issue. Can someone please reach out who can help?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Everything is gone from this account!!! What happened?  I worked on things on Saturday and now all of a sudden everything is just gone... Nothing changed with our account...

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I accidently deleted my billing information and now my pro account is gone... How do I get all of my stuff back????? HELP!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I would like to RESTOR my Team Fit View Athletics Brand Guide. It was mistakenly taken town and ALL my years of designs are gone now. thank you!
What do you need help with ?: Hello, good night! All my templates are gone. What do I do braseeeeeel ????

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: ALL MY DESIGN from the past 7+ years are gone?!!  PLease HELP!

Describe your issue: PLS I MADE 20 PAGES ALREADY AND IT SUDDENLY JUST GONE AND IT BACK ON A BLANK TEMPLATE PLS HELP ME GET IT BACK , I SPENT 2 DAYS FOR IT.........

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: where has my templates gone?

What kind of problem?: Other

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have Canva Pro but it says I don’t. I’ve been paying for months. Also my designs are gone help.
What do you need help with ?: Hello all my work is gone.
What help do you need ?: I re-entered my email and all my work is gone.
What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Recover my charlotte pots team !! All my designs are gone!
What do you need help with ?: all my templates from last year are gone

What kind of problem?: אחר

תאר את <NAME>: all my comments are gone! it is very important, please help

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: what <NAME> to the resume I made? Its gone
